faqs.question: How does NooLife differ from fitness apps like Hevy or Strong?
faqs.answer: Hevy/Strong = workout tracking only. NooLife = holistic athlete habits (training, recovery, sleep, nutrition, mental game). You're not just tracking reps—you're tracking the full system that creates performance.

faqs.question: Can I sync NooLife with my current fitness tracker (Apple Watch, Garmin)?
faqs.answer: Not yet, but on roadmap. Currently, NooLife tracks habit completion (did you workout today?), not detailed workout metrics. Use your fitness tracker for reps/sets, use NooLife for consistency accountability.

faqs.question: What if I miss training due to injury?
faqs.answer: Injury = active recovery phase. Track recovery habits (cold shower, sleep, stretching). Streak adjusts to your reality. Elite athletes know: recovery IS training.

faqs.question: Do I need to track every single workout?
faqs.answer: Yes. Consistency is the metric that matters. Even light sessions count. 66 days of showing up > sporadic intensity. Your discipline rating reflects this.

faqs.question: How does meditation help athletic performance?
faqs.answer: Mental game = 50% of performance. Meditation trains focus, visualization, anxiety management. Olympians use this. You're leaving gains on table without mental training.
